parameter.name: EndOfPeriod
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = Undefined OR &EndOfPeriod = NULL OR &EndOfPeriod = DateTime(1,1,1) THEN DateTime(3999,12,31) ELSE EndOfPeriod(&EndOfPeriod, "Day") END

dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN FinancialResultTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE FinancialResultTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, FinancialResultTurnovers.SecondPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.MinutePeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.HourPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.DayPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.WeekPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.MonthPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.YearPeriod, FinancialResultTurnovers.Company, FinancialResultTurnovers.StructuralUnit, FinancialResultTurnovers.BusinessActivity, FinancialResultTurnovers.CustomerOrder, FinancialResultTurnovers.GLAccount AS Item, FinancialResultTurnovers.AmountIncomeTurnover, FinancialResultTurnovers.AmountExpenseTurnover, 0 AS ProfitLoss FROM AccumulationRegister.FinancialResult.Turnovers(, , Auto, ) AS FinancialResultTurnovers

parameter.name: EndOfPeriod
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriodUses = Undefined OR &EndOfPeriodUses = NULL OR &EndOfPeriodUses = DateTime(1,1,1) THEN DateTime(3999,12,31) ELSE EndOfPeriod(&EndOfPeriodUses, "Day") END

dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query:
SELECT ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Analytics AS Analytics, ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Currency AS Currency, SUM(ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Amount) AS Amount, SUM(ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.AmountIncome) AS AmountIncome, SUM(ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.AmountExpense) AS AmountExpense, SUM(ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.AmountBalance) AS AmountBalance, SUM(ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.AmountCurBalance) AS AmountCurBalance, SUM(ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.AmountBalance + ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Amount) AS AmountTotal, ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Section AS Section, ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Company FROM InformationRegister.ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference AS ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference WHERE ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod AND ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Period <= &EndOfPeriod
GROUP BY ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Analytics, ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Currency, ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Section, ReportOnCurrencyRatesDifference.Company
ORDER BY Section, Analytics

parameter.name: EndOfPeriod
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriodUses = Undefined OR &EndOfPeriodUses = NULL OR &EndOfPeriodUses = DateTime(1,1,1) THEN DateTime(3999,12,31) ELSE EndOfPeriod(&EndOfPeriodUses, "Day") END

dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT MonthEndErrors.Period, MonthEndErrors.Recorder, MonthEndErrors.LineNumber, MonthEndErrors.Active, MonthEndErrors.OperationKind, MonthEndErrors.ErrorDescription, MonthEndErrors.Company, MonthEndErrors.Analytics, CASE WHEN MonthEndErrors.OperationKind = "DepreciationAccrual" THEN "Depriciation accrual" WHEN MonthEndErrors.OperationKind = "DirectCostCalculation" THEN "Direct cost calculation" WHEN MonthEndErrors.OperationKind = "ActualCostCalculation" THEN "Actual cost calculation" WHEN MonthEndErrors.OperationKind = "CostAllocation" THEN "Cost allocation" ELSE MonthEndErrors.OperationKind END AS OperationKindText FROM InformationRegister.MonthEndErrors AS MonthEndErrors WHERE MonthEndErrors.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod AND MonthEndErrors.Period <= &EndOfPeriod

parameter.name: EndOfPeriod
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriodUses = Undefined OR &EndOfPeriodUses = NULL OR &EndOfPeriodUses = DateTime(1,1,1) THEN DateTime(3999,12,31) ELSE EndOfPeriod(&EndOfPeriodUses, "Day") END

item.name: DataSet1
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED Inventory.ProductsAndServicesCorr AS Products, Inventory.CharacteristicCorr AS ProductCharacteristic, Inventory.BatchCorr AS BatchProducts, Inventory.CorrGLAccount AS ProductsGLAccount, Inventory.CustomerCorrOrder AS CustomerOrderProducts, Inventory.SpecificationCorr AS ProductionSpecification, Inventory.StructuralUnitCorr AS ProductionSubdivision, Inventory.Company AS CompanyProducts, CASE WHEN Inventory.ProductsAndServices = VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServices.EmptyRef) THEN "Intangible costs" ELSE Inventory.ProductsAndServices END AS ProductsAndServices, Inventory.Characteristic AS Characteristic, Inventory.Batch AS Batch, Inventory.GLAccount AS GLAccount, Inventory.Amount AS Amount, Inventory.Quantity AS Quantity, 0 AS ProductsQuantity, Inventory.Specification AS Specification, Inventory.ProductsAndServices.MeasurementUnit AS UnOfMeas, Inventory.ProductsAndServicesCorr.MeasurementUnit AS UnOfMeasProducts FROM AccumulationRegister.Inventory AS Inventory WHERE Inventory.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) AND Inventory.ProductionExpenses AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN Inventory.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE Inventory.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END

item.name: DataSet2
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED ProductReleaseTurnovers.Company AS CompanyProducts, ProductReleaseTurnovers.StructuralUnit AS ProductionSubdivision, ProductReleaseTurnovers.ProductsAndServices AS Products, ProductReleaseTurnovers.Characteristic AS ProductCharacteristic, ProductReleaseTurnovers.Batch AS BatchProducts, ProductReleaseTurnovers.CustomerOrder AS CustomerOrderProducts, ProductReleaseTurnovers.Specification AS ProductionSpecification, ProductReleaseTurnovers.QuantityTurnover AS ProductsQuantity, ProductReleaseTurnovers.ProductsAndServices.MeasurementUnit AS UnOfMeasProducts FROM AccumulationRegister.ProductRelease.Turnovers(, , Auto, ProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType <> VALUE(Enum.ProductsAndServicesTypes.Service)) AS ProductReleaseTurnovers

item.name: DataSet3
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED Inventory.ProductsAndServices AS Products, Inventory.Characteristic AS ProductCharacteristic, Inventory.Batch AS BatchProducts, Inventory.GLAccount AS ProductsGLAccount, Inventory.CustomerOrder AS CustomerOrderProducts, Inventory.Specification AS ProductionSpecification, Inventory.StructuralUnit AS ProductionSubdivision, Inventory.Company AS CompanyProducts, "Intangible costs" AS ProductsAndServices, "Processing services" AS GLAccount, Inventory.Amount AS Amount, Inventory.Quantity AS Quantity, 0 AS ProductsQuantity, Inventory.ProductsAndServices.MeasurementUnit AS UnOfMeasProducts FROM AccumulationRegister.Inventory AS Inventory WHERE Inventory.Recorder REFS Document.SubcontractorReport AND Inventory.FixedCost AND Inventory.StructuralUnit.StructuralUnitType = VALUE(Enum.StructuralUnitsTypes.Warehouse) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN Inventory.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE Inventory.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END

parameter.name: EndOfPeriod
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriodUses = Undefined OR &EndOfPeriodUses = NULL OR &EndOfPeriodUses = DateTime(1,1,1) THEN DateTime(3999,12,31) ELSE EndOfPeriod(&EndOfPeriodUses, "Day") END

dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query:
SELECT FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.FixedAsset AS FixedAsset, FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.FixedAsset.Code AS Code, SUM(FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.DepreciationReceipt) AS DepreciationReceipt, SUM(FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.CostClosingBalance) AS CostClosingBalance, FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.FixedAsset.DepreciationMethod AS DepreciationMethod, FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Company FROM AccumulationRegister.FixedAssets.BalanceAndTurnovers(&BeginOfPeriod, &EndOfPeriod, Recorder, , ) AS FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers WHERE VALUETYPE(FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Recorder) = Type(Document.FixedAssetsDepreciation)
GROUP BY FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.FixedAsset, FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.FixedAsset.DepreciationMethod, FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.FixedAsset.Code, FixedAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Company

parameter.name: EndOfPeriod
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriodUses = Undefined OR &EndOfPeriodUses = NULL OR &EndOfPeriodUses = DateTime(1,1,1) THEN DateTime(3999,12,31) ELSE EndOfPeriod(&EndOfPeriodUses, "Day") END

item.name: DataSet1
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.Company, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.StructuralUnit, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.Currency AS Currency, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountReceipt, 0 AS AmountExpense, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountCurReceipt, 0 AS AmountCurExpense, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.CostOpeningBalance, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.CostClosingBalance, 0 AS CostReceipt, 0 AS CostExpense, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, CASE WHEN RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder FROM AccumulationRegister.RetailAmountAccounting.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, RegisterRecords, ) AS RetailAmountAccountingBalancesAndTurnovers

item.name: DataSet2
item.query:
SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN RetailAmountAccounting.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE RetailAmountAccounting.Recorder END AS Recorder, RetailAmountAccounting.Company, RetailAmountAccounting.StructuralUnit, RetailAmountAccounting.Currency AS Currency, RetailAmountAccounting.AmountCur AS AmountCurReceipt, RetailAmountAccounting.Amount AS AmountReceipt, RetailAmountAccounting.Cost AS CostReceipt, NULL AS AmountCurExpense, NULL AS AmountExpense, NULL AS CostExpense, 0 AS AmountCurOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountOpeningBalance, 0 AS CostOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountCurClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountClosingBalance, 0 AS CostClosingBalance, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, Day) AS DayPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, WEEK) AS WeekPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, TENDAYS) AS TenDaysPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, MONTH) AS MonthPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, QUARTER) AS QuarterPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, YEAR) AS YearPeriod FROM AccumulationRegister.RetailAmountAccounting AS RetailAmountAccounting WHERE RetailAmountAccounting.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN RetailAmountAccounting.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE RetailAmountAccounting.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END
UNION ALL
SELECT RetailAmountAccounting.Recorder, RetailAmountAccounting.Company, RetailAmountAccounting.StructuralUnit, RetailAmountAccounting.Currency, NULL, NULL, NULL, RetailAmountAccounting.AmountCur, RetailAmountAccounting.Amount, RetailAmountAccounting.Cost, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, Day), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, WEEK), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, TENDAYS), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, MONTH), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, QUARTER), BEGINOFPERIOD(RetailAmountAccounting.Period, YEAR) FROM AccumulationRegister.RetailAmountAccounting AS RetailAmountAccounting WHERE RetailAmountAccounting.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) AND CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriod = DATETIME(1, 1, 1) THEN RetailAmountAccounting.Period >= &BeginOfPeriod ELSE RetailAmountAccounting.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod END

parameter.name: EndOfPeriod
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN &EndOfPeriodUses = Undefined OR &EndOfPeriodUses = NULL OR &EndOfPeriodUses = DateTime(1,1,1) THEN DateTime(3999,12,31) ELSE EndOfPeriod(&EndOfPeriodUses, "Day") END

v8:item.v8:content: Остатки по розничной точке ( суммовой учет)

dcscor:item.dcscor:value: Errors appeared when ending the month
